name: part_001
file: tmp_【#ブラちょこ】Black choco Christmas！5周年３DLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [YjTnRIIczcE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: MC segment where Yuzuki Choco welcomes the audience and introduces the livestream's theme and hashtag.
Performance of the song 'Black Christmas' by Yuzuki Choco and guest Yozora Mel.

subtitles.original: 今日は来てくれてありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming today!

subtitles.original: 今回はブラッククリスマスということで...
subtitles.english: This time, it's a Black Christmas...

subtitles.original: まあね、ハロウィンとクリスマス、
subtitles.english: Well, you see, Halloween and Christmas,

subtitles.original: 両方いっぺんに楽しんじゃおうという内容になっておりまーす！
subtitles.english: we're going to enjoy both at once in this show!

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグはこちら！
subtitles.english: The hashtag is here!

subtitles.original: カタカナで『ブラ』、
subtitles.english: In katakana, "Bura",

subtitles.original: そしてひらがなで『ちょこ』
subtitles.english: and in hiragana, "Choco".

subtitles.original: 合わせて #ブラちょこ でいっぱい呟いてくださーい！
subtitles.english: Together, that's #BuraChoco, so please tweet a lot!

subtitles.original: それでは、早速次の曲にいきたいんですけど...
subtitles.english: Now, I'd like to go to the next song right away...

subtitles.original: まあね、ブラッククリスマスということで...
subtitles.english: Well, since it's a Black Christmas...

subtitles.original: みんなにね、ちょっとプレゼント
subtitles.english: I've prepared a little present

subtitles.original: 用意しちゃいましたー！
subtitles.english: for everyone!

subtitles.original: それでは、こちらどうぞ！
subtitles.english: Now then, here you go!

subtitles.original: ドドーン！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: さてさて、中には何が入っているのかな？
subtitles.english: Now, now, what could be inside?

subtitles.original: みんな、楽しみにしててねー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, look forward to it!

subtitles.original: ブラッククリスマス / 作詞・作曲・編曲：まふまふ
subtitles.english: Black Christmas / Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Mafumafu

subtitles.original: ブッシュドノエルに蜘蛛の巣(リース)
subtitles.english: Bûche de Noël with spider webs (wreaths)

subtitles.original: Ding Dong Ding Dong
subtitles.english: Ding Dong Ding Dong

subtitles.original: 食べ足りないや
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten enough

subtitles.original: 靴下の中身は味気ない
subtitles.english: The contents of the stocking are bland

subtitles.original: Ding Dong Ding Dong
subtitles.english: Ding Dong Ding Dong

subtitles.original: 響け鐘の音
subtitles.english: Let the bells ring

subtitles.original: いい子は嫌 あいつに任せた
subtitles.english: I don't want to be a good kid; I'll leave that to them

subtitles.original: 悪い子になった あの子に夢中さ
subtitles.english: I'm crazy about that girl who's become a bad kid

subtitles.original: どこへ行くんだい？
subtitles.english: Where are you going?

subtitles.original: どこへ逃げるんだい？
subtitles.english: Where are you running off to?

subtitles.original: 遊ぼう 遊ぼう
subtitles.english: Let's play, let's play

subtitles.original: For my for you Merry Christmas Gift
subtitles.english: For my for you Merry Christmas Gift

subtitles.original: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight
subtitles.english: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight

subtitles.original: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight
subtitles.english: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight

subtitles.original: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight
subtitles.english: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight

subtitles.original: Our Santa Claus...
subtitles.english: Our Santa Claus...

subtitles.original: 悪い子はここかな？
subtitles.english: Is the bad child here?

subtitles.original: うなされるだけの毎日に
subtitles.english: In days filled only with nightmares

subtitles.original: まだ夢を見てるのはどうして
subtitles.english: Why am I still dreaming?

subtitles.original: 12時の君を目覚めさせるよ
subtitles.english: I'll wake you up at 12 o'clock

subtitles.original: 冷たい街角はChristmas
subtitles.english: The cold street corners are Christmas

subtitles.original: 悪戯つきのセカイを
subtitles.english: Looking for a world full of mischief,

subtitles.original: 探せる祈りなどはないさ
subtitles.english: there are no prayers to be found

subtitles.original: 泣き声をかき消して鐘が鳴る
subtitles.english: Bells ring, drowning out the cries

subtitles.original: まだファンタジーを赤裸々に乗せての
subtitles.english: Still carrying fantasy candidly,

subtitles.original: 今宵は Ding Dong Ding Dong
subtitles.english: Tonight is Ding Dong Ding Dong

subtitles.original: 明かさず眠る Happy Christmas Day
subtitles.english: Sleeping without dawn, Happy Christmas Day

subtitles.original: 愛のベール クリスマスにパーティ
subtitles.english: A veil of love, a party at Christmas

subtitles.original: 賛成さオーケー チケットなしならば
subtitles.english: I agree, okay, if there's no ticket

subtitles.original: 響けブラックな星の鐘ベルだ
subtitles.english: Let the black star-bell ring

subtitles.original: だからビフォアタイムだホワイト
subtitles.english: So it's before time, white

subtitles.original: 導いたらハロウィン
subtitles.english: If it leads to Halloween

subtitles.original: それじゃなんだかんだで誰かの手のひら
subtitles.english: Then somehow, it's in someone's palm

subtitles.original: 悪戯しようぜ
subtitles.english: Let's play a trick

subtitles.original: 大騒ぎしようぜ
subtitles.english: Let's make a big scene

subtitles.original: 偽物になって 本物気取って
subtitles.english: Becoming a fake, pretending to be the real thing

subtitles.original: どこへ行くんだい？
subtitles.english: Where are you going?

subtitles.original: どこへ逃げるんだい？
subtitles.english: Where are you running off to?

subtitles.original: 遊ぼう There’s no way you can get out of this world
subtitles.english: Let's play, there’s no way you can get out of this world

subtitles.original: 踊り明かせ今宵はトゥナイト
subtitles.english: Dance the night away, tonight's the night

subtitles.original: 目眩めくばかりはサティスライト
subtitles.english: Only dazzling things are satis-light

subtitles.original: プラスな愛に嘘はない
subtitles.english: There's no lie in positive love

subtitles.original: ここに縛りはない
subtitles.english: There are no restraints here

subtitles.original: 昨日2時から地獄まで
subtitles.english: From yesterday at 2 o'clock until hell

subtitles.original: いいからさっさと昇華しろ
subtitles.english: Whatever, just hurry up and sublimate

subtitles.original: Merry Christmas!
subtitles.english: Merry Christmas!

subtitles.original: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight
subtitles.english: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight

subtitles.original: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight
subtitles.english: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight

subtitles.original: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight
subtitles.english: Our Santa Claus is coming tonight

subtitles.original: Our Santa Claus...
subtitles.english: Our Santa Claus...

subtitles.original: 攫ってやろうか？
subtitles.english: Shall I snatch you away?

subtitles.original: 愛おしい幸せなんて
subtitles.english: Something like precious happiness...
